title: Unsafe Login Query
description: The banking portal concatenates raw user input into the SQL query that checks credentials.
vulnerable_snippet:
username = request.json["username"]
password = request.json["password"]
query = f"SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = '{username}' AND password = '{password}'"
return db.execute(query).fetchone()
acceptance_criteria: User input must not be concatenated into SQL statements.
Prepared statements or safe query builders must be used.
The query must still authenticate valid users.
hints: Use parameterized queries instead of string interpolation.
Review how SQLAlchemy handles bound parameters.
